metadata.title: PM condoles over deaths in Air India crash

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Thursday said he was saddened by the tragic crash of Air India flight near Ahmedabad. In a post on X, he said, "We extend our condolences to the families of the victims grieving this immense loss. Our thoughts and prayers are with all those affected by this heartbreaking tragedy."
